html:
{{_("اذن صرف من مخزون الأمانة (تعاقد التخزين) ")}}

{{_('Date')}}: {{ doc.posting_date }}
{{_('Shipped To')}}: {{ doc.to_warehouse }}
{{_('Attention')}}: {{ doc.attention or ''}}
{{_('Receipt')}} # : {{ doc.name }}
{{ doc.remarks or ''}}
{% for item in doc.items %} {% endfor %}
{{_('Sr.')}}
{{_('Product ID')}}
{{_('Description')}}
{{_('Lot Number')}}
{{_('Quantity')}}
{{_('Unit Price')}}
{{_('Total Value')}}
{{ loop.index }} {{ item.item_code }} {{ item.description or ''}} {{ item.batch_no or '' }} {{ item.qty }} {{ frappe.utils.fmt_money(item.basic_rate,currency=doc.currency) }} {{ frappe.utils.fmt_money(item.basic_amount,currency=doc.currency) }}
{{_('Quantities Requested by')}} :
{{_('Name')}}: ..........................................................................
{{_('Date')}}: ..........................................................................
{{_('Signature')}}: ..........................................................................
{{_('NOTE')}}:
{{_('SUBTOTAL')}} : {{ frappe.utils.fmt_money(doc.total_amount,currency=doc.currency) }}
{{_('Sales Tax 14%')}} : {{ frappe.utils.fmt_money(doc.total_amount * 0.14,currency=doc.currency) }}
{{_('TOTAL')}} : {{ frappe.utils.fmt_money(doc.total_amount * 1.14,currency=doc.currency) }}
name: Vana
